title: The Saints Motorcycle Club: The Full Collection
description: “If you like it rough, you’ll like it here.”The story of curvy Claire Westwood's transformation from small time reporter to full time biker babe. When she finds herself in the wrong place at the wrong time, The Saints can't let her leave. After she goes down on the VP of the motorcycle club, her place is solidified.The Saints use her connections with the media to get intel on the corrupt sheriff and his ex-Saint brother. It's the Saints versus the law, and only one side can come out alive. Just when Claire thinks she has the Saints figured out, she gets a curveball thrown at her, a new boss. A hard woman to figure out, Maddie has her own connections to the Saints.Be warned, this book is filled with action, sex, and intrigue; a non-stop thriller from start to finish. This novella is intended for mature audiences only. It contains very graphic descriptions of bad boys, bikers, and babes.
author: Cora Hart
